description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
number of experiment from publication
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
actions the experimenter performed - hand_closing/nose_wiping/scratching/wrist_shaking/yawning
number of yawning events in the baseline condition
number of yawning events in the experimental condition
number of nose-wiping events in the baseline condition
number of nose-wiping events in the experimental condition
seconds spent scratching in the baseline condition
seconds spent scratching in the experimental condition
number of wrist-shaking events in the baseline condition
number of wrist-shaking events in the experimental condition
number of hand-closing events in the baseline condition
number of hand-closing events in the experimental condition
